languages.text: "Вы совершенно правы, Ваше Сиятельство! Сегодня же оглашу сей указ..." {n}Руолдо улыбается вам в ответ, и от движения мышц его лицо идет неприятными складками.{/n}
"Most assuredly, Your Celestial Highness! I shall proclaim this decree this very day..." {n}Ruoldo smiles, causing his attached face to crease in an unsettling way.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вы совершенно правы, Ваше Сиятельство! Сегодня же оглашу сей указ..." {n}Руолдо улыбается вам в ответ, и от движения мышц его лицо идет неприятными складками.{/n}

languages.text: “一点都没错，来自上界的大人！我今天就下令颁布这条法令……”{n}罗尔多露出了笑容，被扯平的脸也皱了起来，令人心生不安。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Most assuredly, Your Celestial Highness! I shall proclaim this decree this very day..." {n}Ruoldo smiles, causing his attached face to crease in an unsettling way.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “一点都没错，来自上界的大人！我今天就下令颁布这条法令……”{n}罗尔多露出了笑容，被扯平的脸也皱了起来，令人心生不安。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ルオルドが微笑むと、筋肉の動きによって縫い付けられた顔が不気味に歪んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo smiles, causing his muscles to crease his attached face in a disturbing way.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ルオルドが微笑むと、筋肉の動きによって縫い付けられた顔が不気味に歪んだ。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Desde luego, Excelencia Celestial! Proclamaré este decreto hoy mismo...». {n}Ruoldo sonríe, haciendo que la cara que tiene instalada se arrugue de forma perturbadora.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Most assuredly, Your Celestial Highness! I shall proclaim this decree this very day..." {n}Ruoldo smiles, causing his attached face to crease in an unsettling way.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Desde luego, Excelencia Celestial! Proclamaré este decreto hoy mismo...». {n}Ruoldo sonríe, haciendo que la cara que tiene instalada se arrugue de forma perturbadora.{/n}

languages.text: "Elbette Semavi Efendimiz! Bu hükmü bugün duyuracağım..." {n}Gülümseyen Ruoldo, takılı yüzünün rahatsız edici bir şekilde kırışmasına neden oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Most assuredly, Your Celestial Highness! I shall proclaim this decree this very day..." {n}Ruoldo smiles, causing his attached face to crease in an unsettling way.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Elbette Semavi Efendimiz! Bu hükmü bugün duyuracağım..." {n}Gülümseyen Ruoldo, takılı yüzünün rahatsız edici bir şekilde kırışmasına neden oluyor.{/n}

languages.text: « C'est comme si c'était fait, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! Je proclamerai ce décret dès aujourd'hui... » {n}Ruoldo sourit, son visage cousu se plissant d'une manière troublante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Most assuredly, Your Celestial Highness! I shall proclaim this decree this very day..." {n}Ruoldo smiles, causing his attached face to crease in an unsettling way.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est comme si c'était fait, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! Je proclamerai ce décret dès aujourd'hui... » {n}Ruoldo sourit, son visage cousu se plissant d'une manière troublante.{/n}

languages.text: "Fürwahr, Eure himmlische Hoheit!" Ich werde dieses Dekret noch heute verkünden ..." {n}Ruoldo lächelt und verzieht sein angeheftetes Gesicht zu einer verstörenden Fratze.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Most assuredly, Your Celestial Highness! I shall proclaim this decree this very day..." {n}Ruoldo smiles, causing his attached face to crease in an unsettling way.{/n}
